summary: The diff implements the HowItWorks page layout changes (REQ-2) correctly, with a 2×2 grid of stage cards showing Roman numerals, numeric badges, stage titles, descriptions, and references to the four generated images. However, the actual PNG image files (REQ-1) are not present in the diff — no files were added under frontend/public/assets/generated/, meaning the four required static image assets were not generated or committed.

missing_requirements.requirement: Generate four new stage illustration images (stage1-basic-construction.dim_800x800.png, stage2-refined-lineart.dim_800x800.png, stage3-hair-detail.dim_800x800.png, stage4-final-shaded.dim_800x800.png) and place them in frontend/public/assets/generated/
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows 0 added files and no binary/image assets were added. The ADDED FILES section is explicitly 'none'. The HowItWorks.tsx references these image paths but the actual PNG files do not appear to have been committed.
